feed.subtitle: A collection of tools and ideas for working with Purple Air data keywords - purpleair, data science, open source

entry.title: Purple Air Group Map - Our first contribution!

link.title: Purple Air Group Map - Our first contribution!

entry.summary: Purple Air Group Map Using Purple Air devices for research is becoming more and more common thanks to their low cost and high quality of tooling (website, API, community). Some research groups or private citizens want to keep their devices private for a number of reasons, but it can still be handy to see these devices on a map. Using the API, along with some simple HTML and JavaScript, you can...
